response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a competitive rate. I trust this proposal aligns well with your budget and strategic goals. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 12500}
